snippet.title: C.A.R.D.S. RPG: The Misty Battlefield  Story Trailer
snippet.description:
This game brings together roguelike deck building with SRPGs to create a whole new genre. Follow Vel as she leads the Clausewitz Battalion into battle against Fahftania and the Hellmuth Brigade. Use 50 different cards to build the strongest deck and fight enemies on a map shrouded in mist. 

Steam ： https://store.steampowered.com/app/2539880/_CARDS_RPG/ Discord： https://discord.gg/ajawXaQqnK Twitter： https://twitter.com/astargames_en 

© 2024 ACQUIRE Corp. All Rights Reserved.
